mapper.sql: MODULE_ID, MODULE_NAME, MENU_URL, MENU_ICON, TOP_MENU_ID, PARENT_ID, LOCKED, SYS_FLAG, BTN_ID, MODULE_TYPE
mapper.insert: insert into w_acc_st.W_OP_SYS_MODULE (MODULE_ID, MODULE_NAME, MENU_URL, MENU_ICON, TOP_MENU_ID, PARENT_ID, LOCKED, SYS_FLAG, BTN_ID, MODULE_TYPE) values (#{moduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topMenuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locked,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sysFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{btnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleType,jdbcType=CHAR})

MODULE_ID,
MODULE_NAME,
MENU_URL,
MENU_ICON,
TOP_MENU_ID,
PARENT_ID,
LOCKED,
SYS_FLAG,
BTN_ID,
MODULE_TYPE,

mapper.update:
update w_acc_st.W_OP_SYS_MODULE
MODULE_NAME = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MENU_URL = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MENU_ICON = #{menuIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOP_MENU_ID = #{topMenuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOCKED = #{locked,jdbcType=CHAR},
SYS_FLAG = #{sysFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BTN_ID = #{btnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODULE_TYPE = #{moduleType,jdbcType=CHAR},
where MODULE_ID = #{moduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update w_acc_st.W_OP_SYS_MODULE set MODULE_NAME = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_URL = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_ICON = #{menuIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOP_MENU_ID = #{topMenuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCKED = #{locked,jdbcType=CHAR}, SYS_FLAG = #{sysFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BTN_ID = #{btnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODULE_TYPE = #{moduleType,jdbcType=CHAR} where MODULE_ID = #{moduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a2.* from (select a1.*,rownum rn from (select * from w_acc_st.W_OP_SYS_MODULE where (module_name like #{moduleName} or menu_url like #{menuUrl}) order by ${sort} ${order} ) a1) a2 where a2.rn between #{pageOffset} and #{pageSize}
select count(*) from w_acc_st.W_OP_SYS_MODULE where MODULE_ID = #{moduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.* from w_acc_st.w_op_sys_module a,w_acc_st.w_op_sys_group_module b,w_acc_st.w_op_sys_group_operator c where a.module_id=b.module_id and b.sys_group_id=c.sys_group_id and c.sys_operator_id=#{sysOperatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from w_acc_st.w_op_sys_module
MODULE_ID = #{moduleId,jdbcType=CHAR} and
MODULE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{moduleName,jdbcType=CHAR}),'%') and
TOP_MENU_ID = #{topMenuId,jdbcType=CHAR} and
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=CHAR} and
SYS_FLAG = #{sysFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}
order by MODULE_ID

select
from w_acc_st.w_op_sys_module
MODULE_ID = #{moduleId,jdbcType=CHAR} and
MODULE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{moduleName,jdbcType=CHAR}),'%') and
TOP_MENU_ID = #{topMenuId,jdbcType=CHAR} and
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=CHAR} and
SYS_FLAG = #{sysFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}
order by MODULE_ID
